name: Little Cozy Adventure 2 [Alpha]
description:
Little Cozy Adventure 2

Play as Adam the werewolf and help the inhabitants of La Playa beach to get the gay marriage bill passed as law.

Adam has decided to take his pack on vacation to the tranquility and sea breeze. During his trip, he knows a couple of gay males that want to get married but their town does not recognize gay marriage, so they ask Adam for help.

What are you waiting to put on the paws of this brave werewolf and save the day? 

Note: This game was developed initially for rainbowjam2020, a gamejam focused on the development of games with LGBT+ themes.

Controls

Use arrow keys to move.

Press “Space” or “Enter” keys to interact with people and objects.

Press “Shift” key while pressing arrow keys to move faster.

Press “Esc” to open the menu. 

Press "Alt+Enter" to switch between full screen and windowed mode. 

You can also use a Gamepad to play.
